thread.title: Bears rally in fourth quarter to Beat Chiefs 18-17
thread.title_full: Bears rally in fourth quarter to Beat Chiefs 18-17

author: Ed Zurga
title: Bears rally in fourth quarter to Beat Chiefs 18-17
text:
Bears rally in fourth quarter to Beat Chiefs 18-17 Ed Zurga 0 Kansas City Chiefs running back Jamaal Charles (25) is helped off the field after an injury in the second half of an NFL football game against the Chicago Bears in Kansas City, Mo., Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015. (AP Photo/Ed Zurga) Ed Zurga As featured on
